GlooKit.GlooFramework

Class GlooApplicationConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • GlooKit.GlooFramework.GlooApplicationConfiguration
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    JSONable<GlooApplicationConfiguration>, java.io.Serializable

    public class GlooApplicationConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, JSONable<GlooApplicationConfiguration>
    GlooApplicationConfiguration is essentially a handle for accessing config files (.cfg) for the GlooApplication Allows for the configuration of fullscreen mode, window pointSize, and frames per second
    Since:
    1.0
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • GlooApplicationConfiguration

        public GlooApplicationConfiguration(java.lang.String fileName)
        Attempts to load a config file. If the file is not found, it makes a new default one
        Parameters:
        fileName - A String representing the filepath
